FuncDef: This command specifies which hour to schedule a command. Multiple hours of the day can be specified. When multiple hours are configured, each of them will cause the schedule to trigger.Day-of-monthorweekdaymust also be specified. All days of the month or weekdays can be specified. If an hour is configured without configuringmonth,weekday,day-of-month, andminute, the event will not execute.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the hour to schedule a command. Values-0 to 23 (maximum 24 hour-numbers).
